# Create a new data frame with City and Year columns
city_year <- data %>%
  distinct(City, Year) %>%
  group_by(City) %>%
  summarize(Num_Hosted = n())

# Create the plot
ggplot(city_year, aes(x = reorder(City,Num_Hosted), y = Num_Hosted)) +
  geom_bar(stat = \identity\"
